name: Burning Man-Shrine Art Gallery-2006
description:
this project is based on a deep playa art project by BiL Ratcliffe---the notes are from a notebook in that art. This is a proof of concept piece for a larger work encompassing 10 notebooks from various deep playa art shrines. Thanks for Playing...BiL Ohmmmmm

To Play: WASD or Arrow Keys to Move; Shift to Run; Space Bar to Jump.
